inair.api

Interface IAController

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    IABaseLayeredItem, IABaseLayout, IAChildLayout, IALayeredNavigation

    public interface IAController
    Interface to let you control inAiR layout.

    Created by Linh Nguyen

    Copyright (c) 2014 SeeSpace.co. All rights reserved.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      UIView findUIViewById(int id)
      Finds a view that was identified by the id attribute from the XML that was processed in #onInitialize(android.os.Bundle).
      void onInitialize(Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Must be override to custom initialize of this layout
      void processDebugKeyPress(int id)
      Use for debug purpose only
      void processTouchEvent(MotionEvent event) 

    • Method Detail

      • findUIViewById

        UIView findUIViewById(int id)
        Finds a view that was identified by the id attribute from the XML that was processed in #onInitialize(android.os.Bundle).
        Parameters:
        id - id attribute from XML
        Returns:
        The ui view if found or null otherwise.

      • onInitialize

        void onInitialize(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Must be override to custom initialize of this layout
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - savedInstanceState

      • processDebugKeyPress

        void processDebugKeyPress(int id)
        Use for debug purpose only
        Parameters:
        id - id of button on android debug layout on android application wrapper
